languages.text: "Кинжал, не испробованный на сухожилии врага, в руках лишь игрушка". {n}Кибелла подает знак соратникам, и веревки, сдерживающие пленных, спадают. В руки изменникам вкладывают оружие.{/n} "Да начнется прощальный танец".
languages.translation_comment:
Кибелла
Диалог прерывается, через затеменение РТ и остальные переносятся в соседнее помещение, начинается БОЙ

Кибелла
Диалог прерывается, через затеменение РТ и остальные переносятся в соседнее помещение, начинается БОЙ

languages.text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."
languages.original_text: "Кинжал, не испробованный на сухожилии врага, в руках лишь игрушка". {n}Кибелла подает знак соратникам, и веревки, сдерживающие пленных, спадают. В руки изменникам вкладывают оружие.{/n} "Да начнется прощальный танец".

traits.locale_text: "Until the dagger you are holding has been tested on the sinew of a foe, you are holding a toy." {n}Kibellah gestures to her fellow cultists, and the ropes restraining the captives fall down. Weapons are put in the renegades' hands.{/n} "Let the farewell dance begin."

"Until the dagger you are holding has been tested on the sinew of a foe, you are holding a toy." {n}Kibellah gestures to her fellow cultists, and the ropes restraining the captives fall down. Weapons are put in the renegades' hands.{/n} "Let the farewell dance begin."

"A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

languages.text: « Une dague qui n'a jamais coupé le moindre tendon n'est rien de plus qu'un jouet. » {n}Kibellah fait signe aux autres cultistes, qui libèrent les prisonniers de leurs entraves et placent des armes dans leurs mains.{/n} « Que la dernière danse commence. »
languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

traits.locale_text: « Une dague qui n'a jamais coupé le moindre tendon n'est rien de plus qu'un jouet. » {n}Kibellah fait signe aux autres cultistes, qui libèrent les prisonniers de leurs entraves et placent des armes dans leurs mains.{/n} « Que la dernière danse commence. »

languages.text: «Una daga que no ha cortado nervio no es más que un juguete». {n}Kibellah hace un gesto a los otros cultistas. Liberan a los prisioneros de sus cadenas y colocan armas en sus manos.{/n} «Que comience el último baile».
languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

traits.locale_text: «Una daga que no ha cortado nervio no es más que un juguete». {n}Kibellah hace un gesto a los otros cultistas. Liberan a los prisioneros de sus cadenas y colocan armas en sus manos.{/n} «Que comience el último baile».

languages.text: “没有切过肉、断过筋的匕首，不过是件玩具罢了。”{n}绮贝菈向其他信徒示意。他们将俘虏松绑，把武器塞在他们手中。{/n}“最后的舞蹈开始了。”
languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

traits.locale_text: “没有切过肉、断过筋的匕首，不过是件玩具罢了。”{n}绮贝菈向其他信徒示意。他们将俘虏松绑，把武器塞在他们手中。{/n}“最后的舞蹈开始了。”

languages.text: 「筋を切り裂かない短剣は、おもちゃにすぎない」{n}キベラは他の教団員たちに合図を送った。捕虜を拘束から解き放ち、武器を手に持たせた。 {/n}「さて、最後のダンスを始めよう」
languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

traits.locale_text: 「筋を切り裂かない短剣は、おもちゃにすぎない」{n}キベラは他の教団員たちに合図を送った。捕虜を拘束から解き放ち、武器を手に持たせた。 {/n}「さて、最後のダンスを始めよう」

languages.text: "Ein Dolch, der nie eine Sehne durchtrennt hat, ist nichts weiter als ein Spielzeug." {n}Kibellah deutet auf die anderen Kultisten. Sie lösen die Fesseln der Gefangenen und geben ihnen Waffen.{/n} "Lasst den letzten Tanz beginnen."
languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."

languages.text: "Et kesmeye hançere oyuncak denir." {n}Kibellah, diğer tarikatçılara işarette bulunuyor. Tutsakların bağlarını çözüp ellerine silah veriyorlar.{/n} "Son dans başlasın."
languages.original_text: "A dagger that has not sliced through sinew is nothing more than a toy." {n}Kibellah motions to the other cultists. They release the captives from their restraints and place weapons in their hands.{/n} "Let the final dance begin."
